title: DBMS Level 9 — Normalization & FDs
concept: MCQs on functional dependencies and normal forms.

challenges.title: Q1: Functional Dependency
challenges.description: In a relation R, X → Y means:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) X uniquely determines Y
b) Y uniquely determines X
c) X and Y are always primary keys
d) X and Y cannot be attributes of the same table
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: 1NF Condition
challenges.description: A relation is in First Normal Form (1NF) if:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) It has no partial dependencies
b) It has no transitive dependencies
c) It has only atomic (indivisible) attributes
d) It has at least one candidate key
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
